intro: Back off before I make you, c_nClan!
No. Sorry, y_c. I'm going on my own.
Get away from me.
[t_c hisses at you.]
c_nClan. Hey! I see you with those herbs.
Hand some over. Now.
... Sorry. I know I'm gonna need them.
Aah!!
Please don't hurt me. Here, take a fish.
[t_c tosses a lingcod at your paws and sprints away.]
[You have gained a LINGCOD!]
You should get away from the Cornucopia, y_c. It's dangerous.
leave_okay: Hurry up, then. Here's some food for the road. See you around.

intro: y_c. Hey.
[You jump and lift your head to see t_c, gently holding a blueberry in {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} mouth.]
[They set it down at your paws.]
It's not a lot, but it's a really nice one! Perfectly round, not bruised at all... Looks really juicy!
I'll go find some more.
[You have gained a BLUEBERRY!]
y_c! Help! I'm being chased!

[t_c careens around a tree and almost runs into you, a large salmon in {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} jaws. You unsheathe your claws and puff up, preparing for {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} pursuer to catch up to {PRONOUN/t_c/object} any second.]
Hahahaha! Just kidding. I didn't steal this. Caught it fair and square. Eat up!
Oh, don't give me that look. You can't take a joke!
[You sigh. You may just die of a heart attack before anything else with t_c as your ally.]
[You have gained a SALMON!]
What are you looking at?
Better scurry off. You're lucky I'm too tired to try and kill you right now.
[t_c blinks warmly at you and keeps walking.]
Aaah!!
[t_c barrels into you while sprinting away from an older tribute.]
[They scramble back up to their paws, their eyes wild with fear, before racing away, leaving some of their stuff behind them.]
[You have gained some FOOD and HERBS!]
[t_c is hiding behind a tree, one eye poking out to watch you.]
approach: [You walk towards t_c with your head down, trying to communicate that you're not a threat.]
[However, when you get within a few tail-lengths, the apprentice turns and runs.]
ignore: [You walk away-- you have other things to focus on.]

intro: We should get moving. Hunting will be easier at night.
Unless that's what everyone else is also thinking...
Do you think one of us will be able to make it?
iwill: Love your confidence, but, jeez... have a little faith!
youwill: Do you really think so? Just me?
I don't want you to die... But I guess one of us has to, huh?
no: So pessimistic... you've gotta at least pretend you have a chance!
yes: I guess it can only be one of us, but... we don't have to think about that.
Maybe if I pretend to kill you, you'll be able to sneak out, and we can meet up again once I win, hehe!
Or the other way around, of course.

intro: Hey, how's it going?
I found something cool by the shore. Here.
[You have gained an accessory.]
H-hey! y_c, right?
This is a great place to fish. You can join, I don't mind. There's plenty of room.
Do you want one of mine?
fish_no: Okay. You sure? I don't mind sharing.
Though... salmon is my favourite, so I'm kind of glad to keep it, hehe.
[You learn that this cat's name is t_c. For the next few hours, you fish together at the beach, several fox-lengths of sand between you.]
fish_yes: O-okay! Here, you can have this.
[From where {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/stand/stands} several fox-lengths away, the cat tosses you a SALMON.]
I'm t_c, by the way. Nice to meet you!
[t_c resumes fishing, though {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} ears remain swivelled towards you defensively.]

intro: [The tribute turns on you and hisses, swiping the air in front of your nose with claws unsheathed.]
Back off, c_nClan! This is my food!
[The (clan) cat turns and sprints away as soon as you catch {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} eye.]
Back off, c_nClan cat!
I'm just an apprentice. You wouldn't kill little ol' t_c, would you?!
[While you blink in confusion, t_c skips away from you and disappears in the arena.]

[When you get near the (clan) cat, {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/tackle/tackles} you before you can react. You struggle under {PRONOUN/t_c/poss} paws, nose pressed into the ground, but your opponent is too strong for you to wriggle free.]
Relax, c_nClan. I'm not going to kill you. But I want some of your food. Now.
[This cat's paws certainly aren't empty. This is greed, not desperation. You don't want to let {PRONOUN/t_c/object} push you around.]
refuse: [You hiss up at your assailant, spitting that you refuse to give up the food you've earned.]
handover: [Shaken, you agree to give the cat some food if {PRONOUN/t_c/subject}'ll just leave you alone.]
That's what I like to hear. Hey, what's your name?
I'm t_c. Thanks for the dinner.

intro: [You lock eyes with t_C from across the arena. You didn't really know each other back in c_nClan, but you still feel some comraderie towards your Clanmate.]
[You watch {PRONOUN/t_c/object} snatch something from the loot pile, duck under a flying paw, and sprint out of sight. You hope {PRONOUN/t_c/subject}'ll be okay, at least for a little bit.]
[You're concerned for your Clanmate, t_c. You spot {PRONOUN/t_c/object} in the crowd of the bloodbath, expecting to see a stranger attacking {PRONOUN/t_c/object}.]

[However, the first thing you see is blood flying as {PRONOUN/t_c/subject} {VERB/t_c/slash/slashes} an opponent in the cheek, protecting the small stash of food {PRONOUN/t_c/subject}{VERB/t_c/'ve/'s} garnered.]
[You look away. Maybe you should be more scared than concerned...]
Hello, hello.
y_c, right? You're not feeling violent, are you?
Ah. I guess we all are.
leave: [Without a word, you turn and walk away from the enemy tribute. You don't know what they're capable of.]
stay: Hehe, that's a joke. I'm not feeling violent. Are you?
no: The two of us might not last very long, but at least we'll die with our integrity intact.
yes: Ha! At least you're honest. That's gotta be worth something.
I'm going to go do some foraging. No need to follow me. I'll see you later, alright? Stay safe.
